user_query: I'm planning a company retreat and I want to include some fun activities. Can you check the availability of the username 'username' on Tumblr, Shopify, and Pinterest? Furthermore, search for posts and comments related to team building.

TaskList.description: Check the availability of the username 'username' on Tumblr.
Check the availability of the username 'username' on Shopify.
Check the availability of the username 'username' on Pinterest.
Search for posts related to team building.
Search for comments related to team building.
